Test Piece Contest
La Reine de Saba [unknown arranger]
Coedbach, Pontardulais, Glamorgan, Wales Details from contest programme. Prizes - 1st £15. 2nd £10, 3rd £5, 4th £2. 14th annual contest. 5 bands competed.
